actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution making additional majority party appointments to Senate committees for the 99th Congress and electing chairmen of such committees.

summary.text: Makes majority party appointments to the following Senate committees: (1) Rules and Administration; (2) Small Business; (3) Veterans' Affairs; (4) Ethics; (5) Aging; (6) Indian Affairs; and (7) the Joint Economic Committee. Designates the chairmen of such committees.

titles.title: A resolution making additional majority party appointments to Senate committees for the 99th Congress and electing chairmen of such committees.
